bibl.title: Two Greek Ostraka.
bibl.note: Purchased by the author in Luxor. - I. List of hemerophylakes. Probably mid-second century A.D. - II. List of words and names. Third century A.D. (?).

bibl.title: Antidoron Martino David oblatum. Miscellanea Papyrologica

bibl.seg: E. Boswinkel, B.A. van Groningen et P.W. Pestman (Edd.), Antidoron Martino David oblatum. Miscellanea Papyrologica = Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XVII (Leiden, 1968) pp. 53-55.
Purchased by the author in Luxor. - I. List of hemerophylakes. Probably mid-second century A.D. - II. List of words and names. Third century A.D. (?).
